00020 #ifndef WaveRP_h
00021 #define WaveRP_h
00022 #include <SdFat.h>
00028 #define DVOLUME 1
00029 // Voltage Reference Selections for ADC
00031 uint8_t const ADC_REF_AREF = 0;
00033 uint8_t const ADC_REF_AVCC = 1 << REFS0;
00035 uint8_t const ADC_REF_INTERNAL = (1 << REFS0) | (1 << REFS1);
00037 uint8_t const ADC_REF_MASK = (1 << REFS0) | (1 << REFS1);
00038 
00039 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega1280__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega2560__)
00040 
00041 uint8_t const ADC_MAX_PIN = 15;
00042 #else  // defined(__AVR_ATmega1280__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega2560__)
00043 
00044 uint8_t const ADC_MAX_PIN = 7;
00045 #endif  // defined(__AVR_ATmega1280__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega2560__)
00046 
00047 // Values for rpState
00048 uint8_t const RP_STATE_STOPPED   = 0;
00049 uint8_t const RP_STATE_PLAYING   = 1;
00050 uint8_t const RP_STATE_RECORDING = 2;
00051 
00052 // values for sdStatus
00053 uint8_t const SD_STATUS_BUFFER_BUSY  = 0;
00054 uint8_t const SD_STATUS_BUFFER_READY = 1;
00055 uint8_t const SD_STATUS_END_OF_DATA  = 2;
00056 uint8_t const SD_STATUS_IO_ERROR     = 3;
00057 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 class WaveRP {
00063  public:
00064   // static variable shared with ISR
00066   volatile static uint8_t adcMin;
00068   volatile static uint8_t adcMax;
00070   volatile static uint8_t busyError;
00072   volatile static uint8_t bitsPerSample;
00075   volatile static uint8_t Channels;
00077   volatile static uint8_t rpPause;
00079   volatile static uint8_t rpState;
00081   volatile static uint32_t sampleRate;
00083   static Sd2Card *sdCard;
00085   volatile static uint8_t sdStatus;
00087   volatile static SdBaseFile *sdFile;
00089   static uint32_t sdStartBlock;
00091   static uint32_t sdEndBlock;
00093   volatile static uint32_t sdEndPosition;
00095   volatile static uint32_t sdCurPosition;
00096   #if DVOLUME  || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00097 
00098   volatile static uint8_t volMult;
00100   volatile static uint16_t volOffset;
00101   void setVolume(uint8_t db);
00102   #endif  // DVOLUME
00103   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105   void adcClearRange(void) {
00106     adcMin = 0XFF;
00107     adcMax = 0;
00108   }
00110   uint8_t adcGetRange(void) {return adcMax < adcMin ? 0 : adcMax - adcMin;}
00112   uint8_t adcGetMax(void) {return adcMax;}
00114   uint8_t adcGetMin(void) {return adcMin;}
00116   uint8_t errors(void) {return busyError;}
00118   bool isPaused(void) {return rpPause;}
00120   bool isPlaying(void) {return rpState == RP_STATE_PLAYING;}
00122   bool isRecording(void) {return rpState == RP_STATE_RECORDING;}
00124   void pause(void) {rpPause = true;}
00125   bool play(SdBaseFile* file);
00126   bool record(SdBaseFile* file, uint16_t rate, uint8_t pin, uint8_t ref);
00128   void resume(void) {rpPause = false;}
00129   void stop(void);
00130   bool trim(SdBaseFile* file);
00131   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132   // untested functions
00133   void seek(uint32_t pos);
00134   void setSampleRate(uint32_t samplerate);
00135 };
00136 #endif  // WaveRP_h
